unnormalised: Hey, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Last I heard, Dr. Sharma was optimistic. Hope he recovers soon! Our batting line-up feels incomplete without him. Also, what about Bumrah? Heard his rehab in NCA is going well. We need him for the upcoming series. The stadium extension plans are great; adding 5000 sq ft should really help. Hopefully, fans from Delhi and Mumbai R. will get to see some action!

normalised: Hey, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Last I heard, Doctor Sharma was optimistic. Hope he recovers soon! Our batting line-up feels incomplete without him. Also, what about Bumrah? Heard his rehab in N C A is going well. We need him for the upcoming series. The stadium extension plans are great; adding five thousand square feet should really help. Hopefully, fans from Delhi and Mumbai R. will get to see some action!
